member.name: DONT_OPTIMIZE
member.displayname: Disable Optimizations by the Compiler

member.name: DEBUG_THREADS
member.displayname: Enable Thread Debugging

member.name: STATIC_BUILD
member.displayname: Build static binaries

member.name: LOADABLE_MODULES
member.displayname: Runtime module loading

member.name: DEBUG_FD_LEAKS
member.displayname: Enable File Descriptor Leak Detection

member.name: REBUILD_PARSERS
member.displayname: Rebuild AEL and expression parsers from bison/flex source files

member.name: LOW_MEMORY
member.displayname: Optimize for Low Memory Usage

member.name: BETTER_BACKTRACES
member.displayname: Use libbfd (GPL) to generate better inline backtraces

member.name: USE_HOARD_ALLOCATOR
member.displayname: Use the Hoard Memory Allocator instead of the default system one

member.name: LOTS_OF_SPANS
member.displayname: More than 32 DAHDI spans

member.name: RADIO_RELAX
member.displayname: Relax DTMF for Radio Applications

member.name: G711_NEW_ALGORITHM
member.displayname: Use the NEW ulaw/alaw codecs (slower, but cleaner)

member.name: G711_REDUCED_BRANCHING
member.displayname: New ulaw/alaw codec, reduced branching (might help it run faster in some architectures)

member.name: TEST_CODING_TABLES
member.displayname: New ulaw/alaw codec, turn on table tests on init

member.name: TEST_TANDEM_TRANSCODING
member.displayname: New ulaw/alaw codec, turn on transcoding tests on init

member.name: MALLOC_DEBUG
member.displayname: Keep Track of Memory Allocations

member.name: BUSYDETECT_TONEONLY
member.displayname: Enable additional comparision of only the tone duration not the silence part

member.name: BUSYDETECT_COMPARE_TONE_AND_SILENCE
member.displayname: Assume that tone and silence have the same duration

member.name: BUSYDETECT_DEBUG
member.displayname: Enable additional busy detection debugging

member.name: INTEGER_CALLERID
member.displayname: Use the (less accurate) integer-based method for decoding FSK tones (for embedded systems)

member.name: BUILD_NATIVE
member.displayname: Allow compiler to generate code optimized for the CPU on which the build is performed.
